|brand = LinkSprite |model = pcDuino |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 4 Nano |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;H3; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.3 GHz --> |gpu1chip1 = Mali;-400 MP2; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = ARM |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = 600 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Micro SD Card slot |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646D-BCK0; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2011.09;; |stockos = Linux;3.4.39;Debian 8;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, (64GB)Micro SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 33 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4, CVBS header, IR receiver, DVP Camera Interface, Microphone, GPIO, SPI, I2C, |addchip = 1A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8008B;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089A;;2;,,, 3A, 500KHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8113B;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = ls |defaultpass = ls |manuf = FriendlyARM |manuf_model = NanoPi |manuf_rev = M1 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2016 |estprice = 20 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''"pcDuino4nano" and "2016/08/30"'' is silkscreened between the RAM chips. {{see also|Allwinner|NanoPi series|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 (Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A7) @1.2 GHz *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' @600MHz (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM • [[Samsung]] K4B4G1646D *Onboard Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 3x USB 2.0 ports
==Links of Interest== *[https://linux-sunxi.org/FriendlyARM_NanoPi_M1 ''FriendlyARM NanoPi M1'' on '''SunXi'''] • [[NanoPi M1]] • [[NanoPi M1 Plus]] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/09/13/20-pcduino4-nano-is-yet-another-allwinner-h3-development-board-sort-of ''pcDuino4 Nano - Allwinner H3 Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/pcduino-goes-quad-core-swaps-arduino-for-rpi-compatibility/ ''pcDuino goes quad-core, swaps Arduino for RPi compatibility'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
